name: Prohibition Pounders
description: Prohibition Pounders is a rhythm game set in the 1920s. The game is being developed as a final project for the Marist College Games & Emerging Media course GAME 480N Game Studio. The developers are Marinel Tinnirello, Christopher Ravosa, Melissa Chodzuitko, Yijun Li, Dillon Lane, and Alex DuBois
